name: MONTANA, plaintiff, v. WYOMING and North Dakota.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
MONTANA, plaintiff,
v.
WYOMING and North Dakota.

opinions.text: Justice KAGAN took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
opinions.author: Justice KAGAN took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.

attorneys: Motion of the Special Master for allowance of fees and disbursements is granted, and the Special Master is awarded a total of $162,815.08 for the period May 1, 2014, through December 31, 2016, to be paid equally by Montana and Wyoming.
casebody.head_matter:
MONTANA, plaintiff,
v.
WYOMING and North Dakota.
No. 137, Original.
Supreme Court of the United States
Feb. 27, 2017.
Motion of the Special Master for allowance of fees and disbursements is granted, and the Special Master is awarded a total of $162,815.08 for the period May 1, 2014, through December 31, 2016, to be paid equally by Montana and Wyoming.
